channel.title: Virtus 317 - Economy - Grand Exchange - Party Room - Dicing - Flawless PvP/PvM
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543676/logo2.png[/img]
[hr]
[size=16pt][url=http://virtus-ps.com][b]Website[/b][/url] - [url=http://virtus-ps.com/play.php][b]Play[/b][/url] - [url=http://virtus-ps.com/forum][b]Forum[/b][/url] [/size]
[hr]
[b]Who we are?[/b]
We are a 317 private server community consisting of mature & fully dedicated team bringing you a brand new server with flawless content! Our mainly focused areas are PvP & Skilling, though we have not forgot to bring you awesome bosses and minigames! We also try our best to deliver you daily updates & weekly events!
[b][u][size=16pt]- Features -[/size][/u][/b]
- Stable / NO LAG - All skills working - Grand Exchange - Party room - Voting - Highscores - Warriors Guild - Perfect Dueling - Pest Control - Bank pins - Loyalty titles - Ingame Crown & Name changing - F-keys - Mature & Dedicated staff. - Awesome donator benefits - Dicing - Ring of Wealth - Hand cannon - Donator cape - Ingame weekly lottery - Flawless PvP & PvM System - Ancient curses - Torva with effects - Virtus - Pernix - Primal - Chaotics - TokHaar-Kal - PvP Scoreboard - Max cape - Small cache packed with high-quality content!
[hr]
[u][b][size=16pt]- Media -[/size][/b][/u]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543688/ge.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543700/warriorguild.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543733/Hunter.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543710/interfaces.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543704/Full_virtus___katana.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543716/dice.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543748/namechange.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543760/Tormented.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543768/marena1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4543775/marena2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548488/Frost_Dragons.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548451/Cooking.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548452/Cooking_2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548455/Fletching_1.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548457/Fletching_2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548459/Woodcutting_1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548460/Woodcutting_2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548462/Crafting.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548466/Crafting_2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4548468/Crafting_3.png[/img]
[hr]
[size=16pt][i][b]Start your adventure now...[/b][/i] [url=http://virtus-forum/play.php][b]Play[/b][/url][/size] [/center]

item.title: Virtus 317 - Economy - Grand Exchange - Party Room - Dicing - Flawless PvP/PvM
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

A lot of people are being seen using the Villian or Carbon family theme(s). You should look into have a custom theme made and being unique in terms of your forum. As for the server, I’m not really seeing much interesting media that would want me to get online but I wish for the best.

Read full topic
